attributes.action: Rights to Justice Denied- 11 Years in a Row For Innocent Families & Children.
attributes.additional_details:
Numerous Attempted Murders of Little Children & Defenceless Adults by Cleveland Police Authority & Their Criminal Associates- DRUG DEALERS & Paedophiles. 3 Generations of Our Family including little children continue to be denied our Human Rights,Legal Rights & Rights to Justice By the British government-Home Office-Judicial Office & Ministry of Justice in the U.K.
A FULL PUBLIC INQUIRY & INVESTIGATION IS REQUIRED BEFORE IT IS TOO LATE.

rejection.details: It is not clear what the issues are you wish to be investigated.
